thread.title: Capitola floods nearly a year after bomb cyclone caused widespread damage
thread.title_full: Capitola floods nearly a year after bomb cyclone caused widespread damage

author: Josh Copitch
title: Capitola floods nearly a year after bomb cyclone caused widespread damage
text: Capitola floods nearly a year after bomb cyclone caused widespread damage Capitola floods nearly a year after bomb cyclone caused widespread damage Advertisement Capitola floods nearly a year after bomb cyclone caused widespread damage Less than a year after a bomb cyclone-caused high surf flooded Capitola, the city was hit again by destructive waves. Coastal flooding, with waves reaching 20-25 feet tall, brought familiar sights to the city of Capitola. In early January 2023, a bomb cyclone off the coast of California brought flooding and destruction to the Santa Cruz County coastline. Capitola was hit the hardest, with the Capitola wharf being decimated and coastal businesses being forced to close for months. On Thursday, the Capitola Villages were flooded again. Businesses and homes near the coast are once again inundated with water. Drone video (watch above) shows the extent of that damage. Video Credit: Kaenon Hardy on Youtube. Coastal flooding, with waves reaching 20-25 feet tall, brought familiar sights to the city of Capitola. Advertisement In early January 2023, a bomb cyclone off the coast of California brought flooding and destruction to the Santa Cruz County coastline. Capitola was hit the hardest, with the [Capitola wharf being decimated](https://www.ksbw.com/article/drone-video-shows-the-destruction-of-capitola-wharf/42409272) and coastal businesses being forced to close for months. On Thursday, the Capitola Villages were flooded again. Businesses and homes near the coast are once again inundated with water. Drone video (watch above) shows the extent of that damage. Video Credit: Kaenon Hardy on Youtube.
